actions.name: get_project_head
actions.description: Get the production-ready version of a PromptHub project (typically the last commit on master/main branch). Useful for integrating prompts into your application.

actions.name: list_projects
actions.description: List PromptHub projects for a team. Returns information about each project\

actions.name: run_prompt
actions.description: Run a PromptHub project with optional variables, branch/hash, and chat payload
